description: [KOPILUWAK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1075) was used as a first-stage profiling utility for previous victims of [ANDROMEDA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1074) during [C0026](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0026).(Citation: Mandiant Suspected Turla Campaign February 2023)

external_references.description: Hawley, S. et al. (2023, February 2). Turla: A Galaxy of Opportunity. Retrieved May 15, 2023.
